## Content

The content of this space is split into two main section: A generic introduction into R with emphasis on data munging, summarisation and presentation followed by a section of case examples.

### The basis
___

There are plenty of good books available on R. What follows in only some basic instructions to get people started. In order to lower the learning hurdle the examples used are data that are familiar/common to fisheries scientists in the CRFM region.
